title: Part 317 - LABELING, MARKING DEVICES AND CONTAINERS
content:
Part 317 - LABELING, MARKING DEVICES AND CONTAINERS
State Regulations
§ 317.2 - Labels: definition; required features, version 2
§ 317.8 - False or misleading labeling or practices generally; specific prohibitions and requirements for labels and containers, version 2
§ 317.9 - Labeling of equine products, version 2
§ 317.16 - Labeling and containers of custom prepared products, version 2
§ 317.17 - Interpretation and statement of labeling policy for cured products, version 2
§ 317.19 - Jar closure requirements, version 2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
